name: Bobo Jenkins
description: '''Bobo Jenkins''' (January 7, 1916 â€“ August 14, 1984) was an American [[Detroit blues]] and [[electric blues]] [[guitarist]], [[singing|singer]] and [[songwriter]]. He also built and set up his own [[recording studio]] and [[record label]] in [[Detroit]]. Jenkins is best known for his [[sound recording and reproduction|recordings]] of "Democrat Blues" and "Tell Me Where You Stayed Last Night".
